description:
Hated by everyone around him, Sei Handa goes about his high school life regarded as an outcast—or at least that's what he believes. In reality, Sei is the most popular student on campus, revered by all for his incomparable calligraphy skills, good looks, and cool personality. However, due an endless series of misunderstandings, Handa perceives the worship he receives from his legions of fans as bullying, leading the school's idol to shut himself off from the rest of his classmates.

But distancing himself from his peers doesn't deter them from adoring him; in fact, his attempts at drawing attention away from himself often end up unintentionally converting even the most skeptical of students into believers. Fashion models, shut-in delinquents, obsessive fangirls, and more—none can stand against the brilliance that is Sei Handa.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Calligraphy
tags.description: Centers around the art of calligraphy.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/go_barakamon)

Satsuki Yoshino is a Japanese mangaka, best known for her work in Barakamon and Handa-kun.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/itoken438)__

__Birthplace:__ Mie Prefecture, Japan

__Ken Itou__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Website](http://xfoxtailsx.com) | [Artist Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/foxtails/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/foxtails_kon)

**Introduction:**
Fo'xTails (フォックステイルズ) was a Japanese five-piece rock-band under record label Lantis (2015-2018).

**Final Members:**
- [Takao](https://anilist.co/staff/163423/Takao-Sakuma) (タカオ) - vocalist
- Narukaze (鳴風) - guitarist
- Sakamoto Takayuki (坂本尭之) - bassist
- [TERA](https://anilist.co/staff/153833/Kenji-Terazono) (テラ) - guitarist, programmer

**Former Members:**
- Takahiro (峻洋) - drummer

**Spouse:** [Masumi Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/103635/Masumi-Itou) (alternatively known as Hikaru Nanase)

**Yoshiyuki Itou** is a Japanese producer, music producer and animation planner. He works as a music producer for the company Lantis.

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kat.njima)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kat_njima)**

**Katsuhiro Nakajima** is a Japanese sound effects creator/editor working for [Swara Production](https://anidb.net/creator/3214).
**Suzuki Megumi** is a Japanese publicity and music producer associated with Lantis, who also provides assistance to various works.
